techmeme.title: Atlassian reports Q2 revenue of $1.29B vs. $1.24B est. and expects 26.5% cloud growth, 21.5% data center growth for the fiscal year; TEAM jumps 20%+ pre-market (Samantha Subin/CNBC)
Indian smartphone market's revenue rose 9% YoY in 2024, with shipments up 1% YoY to 153M units; Nothing was the fastest-growing brand, up 577% YoY (Counterpoint Research)
Sources: STMicroelectronics is considering reducing its workforce by about 6%, or up to 3,000 jobs, through early retirements and attrition, amid a chip slump (Bloomberg)
Cloudflare Radar: TikTok has nearly bounced back to its original traffic levels after usage fell 85% when the app temporarily shut down on January 19 (Zach Vallese/CNBC)
Israel-based Anchor, a platform for automated invoice management and collection, raised a $20M Series A, and plans to expand in the US and double its workforce (Meir Orbach/CTech)
